TopicTitle: I would like a little help from fellow KSP'ers.

Articles.Content:
This is one of my first visits to Duna and Ike.

The picture shows my path just after i tried (not successfully enough) to make an aerocapture with Duna. I had to use som extras dV.

However my first mission is to land on ike to refill my kethane.

While fidgeting on my manuever node i got this result. Where would I end up if I went with it?

I'd be glad for any help.

KSP forever.

Arktos out

Never mind, I figured it out...

Thanks anyways.

Arktos out
This is one of those 'Ah... interesting.' moments.
Had the exact same thing going on today near Duna
Er, why are there sooo many pathways visible? Is that part of a mod or a setting I haven't found yet?

Er, why are there sooo many pathways visible? Is that part of a mod or a setting I haven't found yet?

Its what happens when you slingshot off another gravity field and it changes your flight trajectory.

Where would I end up if I went with it?

Ummm.... Dizzy?

And here I thought I had a basic understanding of orbital mechanics.

*THAT* orbit doesn't need a mechanic, it needs a therapist!

Er, why are there sooo many pathways visible? Is that part of a mod or a setting I haven't found yet?
Bug plus trajectories look weird when you see them from another frame of reference.

editing settings.cfg and changing CONIC_PATCH_MODE from 3 to 0 will produce clearer (if uglier) orbits. While you're there, I would suggest upping CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT to something like 6 to see more SOI crossings.
